pages.text: Mottomo fukōna monodenai kagiri, dare mo sore de yaka renai
Soreha (shinri o) usodearu to ii somuki satta-sha
Daga (omo no tame ni) chūsei no kagiri o tsukushita mono wa, sorekara sukuwa re
sono tomi o hodokoshi, jibun o kiyomeru
Mata dareka-ra mo, jihi no hōshū o motomenai
Isshōkenmei ni shikōsha,-nushi no mikao o kou dakedearu
Yagate, kare wa (jūbun ni) manzoku dekirudearou
Asa (no kagayaki) ni oite
seijakuna yoru ni oite (chikau)
Omo wa, anata o misute rarezu, nikuma reta wakede mo nai
Hontōni raise (shōrai) wa, anata ni totte utsushiyo (genzai) yori, motto yoi nodearu
Yagate omo wa anata no manzoku suru mono o o sazuke ni naru
Kare wa minashigo no anata o mitsuke rare, higo nasa retade wanai ka
Kare wa samayotte ita anata o mitsukete, michibiki o atae
Mata mazushī anata o mitsukete, yūfuku ni nasa retade wanai ka
Dakara minashigo o shītagete wa naranai
Kou mono o 揆 Ne tsukete wa naranai
Anata no omo no onkei o nobetsutaeru ga ī
Ware wa, anata no mune o hirogenakatta ka
Anata kara omoni o kudashitade wanai ka
Sore wa, anata no senaka o oshitsukete ita
Mata ware wa, anata no meisei o takametade wanai ka
Hontōni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa ari
hontōni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa aru
Sore de (tōmen no tsutome kara) raku ni nattara, sarani rōku shite
(tada hitosuji ni) anata no omo ni keitō suruga ī
